verses.verse: Now this is the commandment,<WH4687> the statutes,<WH2706> and the ordinances,<WH4941> which Yahweh<WH3068> your God<WH430> commanded<WH6680> to teach<WH3925> you,<WH6213> that you might do them in the land<WH776> where you go<WH5674> over to possess it;<WH3423>

that you might fear<WH3372> Yahweh<WH3068> your God,<WH430> to keep<WH8104> all his statutes<WH2708> and his commandments,<WH4687> which I command<WH6680> you,<WH1121> you, and your son, and your son<WH1121>'s son,<WH1121> all the days<WH3117> of your life;<WH2416> and that your days<WH3117> may be prolonged.<WH748>

Hear<WH8085> therefore,<WH3478> Israel, and observe<WH8104> to do<WH6213> it;<WH3190> that it may be well with you,<WH7235> and that you may increase mightily,<WH3966> as Yahweh,<WH3068> the God<WH430> of your fathers,<WH1> has promised<WH1696> to you,<WH776> in a land flowing<WH2100> with milk<WH2461> and honey.<WH1706>
Hear,<WH8085> Israel:<WH3478> Yahweh<WH3068> is our God;<WH430> Yahweh<WH3068> is one:<WH259>
and you shall love<WH157> Yahweh<WH3068> your God<WH430> with all your heart,<WH3824> and with all your soul,<WH5315> and with all your might.<WH3966>
These words,<WH1697> which I command<WH6680> you this day,<WH3117> shall be on your heart;<WH3824>

and you shall teach them diligently<WH8150> to your children,<WH1121> and shall talk<WH1696> of them when you sit<WH3427> in your house,<WH1004> and when you walk<WH3212> by the way,<WH1870> and when you lie down,<WH7901> and when you rise up.<WH6965>
You shall bind<WH7194> them for a sign<WH226> on your hand,<WH3027> and they shall be for symbols<WH2903> between your eyes.<WH5869>
You shall write<WH3789> them on the door posts<WH4201> of your house,<WH1004> and on your gates.<WH8179>

It shall be,<WH3068> when Yahweh your God<WH430> shall bring<WH935> you into the land<WH776> which he swore<WH7650> to your fathers,<WH1> to Abraham,<WH85> to Isaac,<WH3327> and to Jacob,<WH3290> to give<WH5414> you,<WH1419> great and goodly<WH2896> cities,<WH5892> which you didn't<WH1129> build,

and houses<WH1004> full<WH4392> of all good<WH2898> things,<WH4390> which you didn't fill, and cisterns<WH953> dug<WH2672> out,<WH2672> which you didn't dig, vineyards<WH3754> and olive trees,<WH2132> which you didn't<WH5193> plant, and you shall eat<WH398> and be full;<WH7646>
then beware<WH8104> lest you forget<WH7911> Yahweh,<WH3068> who brought you forth<WH3318> out of the land<WH776> of Egypt,<WH4714> out of the house<WH1004> of bondage.<WH5650>
You shall fear<WH3372> Yahweh<WH3068> your God;<WH430> and you shall serve<WH5647> him,<WH7650> and shall swear by his name.<WH8034>
You shall not go<WH3212> after<WH310> other<WH312> gods,<WH430> of the gods<WH430> of the peoples<WH5971> who are around you;<WH5439>

for Yahweh<WH3068> your God<WH430> in the midst<WH7130> of you is a jealous<WH7067> God;<WH410> lest the anger<WH639> of Yahweh<WH3068> your God<WH430> be kindled<WH2734> against you,<WH8045> and he destroy you from off the face<WH6440> of the earth.<WH127>
You shall not tempt<WH5254> Yahweh<WH3068> your God,<WH430> as you tempted<WH5254> him in Massah.<WH4532>
You shall diligently<WH8104> keep<WH8104> the commandments<WH4687> of Yahweh<WH3068> your God,<WH430> and his testimonies,<WH5713> and his statutes,<WH2706> which he has commanded you.<WH6680>

You shall do<WH6213> that which is right<WH3477> and good<WH2896> in the sight<WH5869> of Yahweh;<WH3068> that it may be well<WH3190> with you,<WH935> and that you may go in and possess<WH3423> the good<WH2896> land<WH776> which Yahweh<WH3068> swore<WH7650> to your fathers,<WH1>
to thrust out<WH1920> all your enemies<WH341> from before<WH6440> you,<WH3068> as Yahweh has spoken.<WH1696>

When your son<WH1121> asks<WH7592> you in time to come,<WH4279> saying,<WH559> "What do the testimonies,<WH5713> the statutes,<WH2706> and the ordinances,<WH4941> which Yahweh<WH3068> our God<WH430> has commanded you mean?<WH6680>"

then you shall tell<WH559> your son,<WH1121> "We were Pharaoh<WH6547>'s bondservants<WH5650> in Egypt:<WH4714> and Yahweh<WH3068> brought us out<WH3318> of Egypt<WH4714> with a mighty<WH2389> hand;<WH3027>
and Yahweh<WH3068> showed<WH5414> great<WH1419> and awesome<WH7451> signs<WH226> and wonders<WH4159> on Egypt,<WH4714> on Pharaoh,<WH6547> and on all his house,<WH1004> before our eyes;<WH5869>
and he brought us out<WH3318> from there,<WH935> that he might bring us in, to give<WH5414> us the land<WH776> which he swore<WH7650> to our fathers.<WH1>

Yahweh<WH3068> commanded<WH6680> us to do<WH6213> all these statutes,<WH2706> to fear<WH3372> Yahweh<WH3068> our God,<WH430> for our good<WH2896> always,<WH3117> that he might preserve us alive,<WH2421> as at this day.<WH3117>
It shall be righteousness<WH6666> to us,<WH8104> if we observe to do<WH6213> all this<WH2063> commandment<WH4687> before<WH6440> Yahweh<WH3068> our God,<WH430> as he has commanded us.<WH6680>"
